title: My computer completely crashes when i use Skype or any other program
body:
{{summoner:7}}  When I am using any program like skype or even if i have music/videos in the background open I computer completely crashes{{summoner:7}} 
Also My computer ran league at around 100 fps with very high setting and now it runs at 60. If i lower it to very low settings it still runs at 60... There is no cap either. I tried wiping my computer, I tried playing with a frame cap, I tried with and without a external cooler... I tried everything. Please reply I can't enjoy the game when it crashes like this. I have already got 20 minute leaver buster bans and if afraid i will get perma banned {{summoner:21}}

replies.body: Driver and windows updates do them....

PC crashes can be caused by a number of different factors, however, most of the time they're caused by driver or hardware issues. We've consolidated the most common solutions in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I strongly recommend your first step be working through all those steps.

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.
